entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is described as a witch who would have been mortified to produce a Squib. She is also mentioned as being delicate and having poor health.

entities.name: doge
entities.description: Doge is described as Ariana's father and is defending her against the accusations of being a Squib.

entities.name: elphias
entities.description: Elphias is mentioned as someone who knows about Ariana's situation and is being questioned by Auntie Muriel.

entities.name: auntie muriel
entities.description: Auntie Muriel is described as a person who is questioning Elphias about Ariana's situation and is defending the idea that Squibs were often hushed up in their day.

entities.name: kendra dumbledore
entities.description: Kendra Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who would not have let her daughter go to a Muggle school.

relationships.description: Ariana is accused by Auntie Muriel and Elphias of being a Squib.
Doge defends Ariana against the accusations of being a Squib.
Auntie Muriel describes how Squibs were often treated in their day, including being shipped off to Muggle schools.
